CustomField.formula: TEXT(FLOOR((DepartureTime__c - AttendanceTime__c) / 3600000)) & ":" & RIGHT("0" & TEXT(FLOOR(MOD((DepartureTime__c - AttendanceTime__c), 3600000) / 60000)), 2) & ":" & RIGHT("0" & TEXT(FLOOR(MOD((DepartureTime__c - AttendanceTime__c), 60000) / 1000)), 2)
CustomField.label: 拘束時間
